column4: Hey guys, have you heard of the neat free XBox 360 Elite giveaway promoted by companies like Blockbuster, Amazon, Netflix, etc?
My buddy just recently got his XBox 360, and now that I've seen it, I'm trying to do the same
it's pretty easy, 1) you sign up  2) complete an offer (like signing up for Netflix, or trying a trial Amazon thing, etc) and 3) you get 8 to 11 people to do the same.
whats that have to do with Ubuntu or even Linux?
